messages.subject: Fwd: [THEFA] Fwd: Berkeley DA Drops Case
messages.msgSnippet: ... He ... DA ... representative ... for ... e-mailing, ... To email plain text is conventional, to add graphics is devine. We ll show you how at
messages.messageBody:
>Date: Tue, 11 Jul 2000 04:45:13 +0000
>From: ccuthbert <ccuthbert@...>
>Reply-To: ccuthbert@...
>X-Accept-Language: en
>To: ccuthbert@...
>Subject: Berkeley DA Drops Case
>
>***Please disseminate widely. It's nice to get good news once in a
>while.***
>
>Attorney Will Rogers called me tonight to share some very good news.
He
>spoke to the District Attorney today, and after that discussion, the
DA
>decided to close the case against the four Berkeley families. They are
>no
>longer facing a trial. Will has been an outstanding legal
representative
>for these families and for all homeschoolers. We are truly grateful
for
>his efforts.
>
>And, dear friends, we thank all of you who helped by calling,
e-mailing,
>writing, and contributing to the legal defense fund. Will feels your
>involvement was an important part of this successful outcome, and it
>also
>offered some protection from CPS for the children involved. It's
>been a long stressful month, but worth it. It's great knowing that
>California homeschoolers can rally together when fellow homeschoolers
>are
>facing a legal challenge.
>
>Thanks again.
>
>Karen Taylor
>Executive Director
>California Homeschool Network


------------------------------------------------------------------
------
To email plain text is conventional, to add graphics is devine.
We'll show you how at www.supersig.com.
